source/models/TickModel.js

TickModel

A Backbone.Model that represents the data required to build a CMapTickView. The model contains a data object that has keys for each row to display in the view and array values for each tick to display in each row. An example data object might look like this:

    {PC3: [.23,-.28], MCF7: [-0.6]}

example usage

    tick_model = new TickModel();
Barista.Models.TickModel = Backbone.Model.extend({

defaults

set up defaults for model values

  1. {String} title the title to use in the plot, defaults to ""
  2. {Object} data_object the data object to use when plotting. defualts to {}
defaults: { title: "", data_object: {} } });
